content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Annual General Meeting of AqualisBraemar ASA will be held in Oslo in June 2020

Date: 10th June 2020
Time: 11:00 CET
Venue: 8th floor, Olav Vs gate 6, 0161 Oslo[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Related documents

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Notice of Annual General Meeting 2020″ style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”peacoc” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”far fa-file-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2020%2F05%2FAQUALIS_INNKALLING_KOMPLETT_WEB.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Proposal from the Nomination Committee” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”peacoc” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”far fa-file-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2020%2F05%2FProposal-Nomination-committee_AGM-2020_distributed.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The annual general meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held on 11 June 2019 at 08:00 CET at the offices of Advokatfirmaet Haavind AS atBygdøy allé 2, 0257 Oslo.
